long_description: Life's too short to stay still for long, so when you're ready to roll, grab the Haiku Zip Wallet. It holds your cards, coins, phone and even your passport-in case the border beckons. Contains 12+ card slots and has a zip coin pocket. Fits passport, receipts and lip gloss; throw your phone in if there's room! Secure zip closure; detachable wrist strap. The Haiku Zip Wallet is made from recycled material.
short_description: Life's too short to stay still for long, so when you're ready to roll, grab the Haiku Zip Wallet. It holds your cards, coins, phone and even your passport-in case the border beckons.
